messages.title: A Clear Voice for Our Area
messages.content: As MP, Mark Williams always stood up for what was right for Ceredigion, from fighting for local health services and schools, to standing up for local businesses.

messages.title: Stop the Conservative Betrayal of Rural Wales
messages.content: The Conservatives have broken their promise to the farmers of Wales by refusing to protect Welsh farming standards from low quality imports in trade deals.

messages.title: Putting Recovery First
messages.content: Lib Dems would put the recovery from the pandemic first with a £48 billion investment in public services.

messages.title: Backing a Brighter Future
messages.content: Support for mental health, cutting NHS wait times, and tackling climate change are key priorities.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting for local health services and ensuring the community gets the support it needs.
Defending local schools and educational institutions.
Standing up for local businesses and opposing trade deals that undermine Welsh farming standards.
Promising a £48 billion investment in public services as part of a post-pandemic recovery plan.
Prioritizing mental health and aiming to cut NHS wait times.
Addressing climate change and protecting the environment.
Supports bringing rail services back into public ownership to stop fare rises and service cuts.

issues.economy: Lib Dems would put the recovery from the pandemic first with a £48 billion investment in public services.
issues.education: As MP, Mark Williams always stood up for local schools.
